images.title: Derek Harper / Quantock bridleway
images.caption: Quantock bridleway. The bridleway runs along the ridge top of the Quantock Hills, and is followed here by both the Macmillan Way West and the Samaritans Way South West.

description: Starting at Bristol follow the Samaritans Way to Lynton , in Devon, and visit the Avon Gorge, the Chew Valley, the Cheddar Gorge , the Mendips, the Quantock Hills and the Brendon Hills . The walk also takes you through the beautiful Exmoor National Park where you will visit the lovely Doone Valley.  Here you can try our lovely Lorna Doone Walk . This trail visits some of the sites connected to Richard Dodderidge Blackmore's 1869 novel 'Lorna Doone: A Romance of Exmoor'.
